alert.note: Alert for Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 1:59PM CDT until April 27 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL HIDALGO COUNTY... At 158 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Granjero, or near Hidalgo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Pharr, Hidalgo, South McAllen, Rio Grande Regional Hospital, Newport Landing, South Pharr Elementary School, Pharr Police Academy, Airport Park, Granjero and Pharr Fire Station Three. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
